684e97d8-dea5-4e75-b2eb-6c2c4f6585dd.name: Solar Power Subsystem
684e97d8-dea5-4e75-b2eb-6c2c4f6585dd.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.principle: Standard Photovoltaic Panels with Basic Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses cost-effective, rigid solar panels and lead-acid batteries for reliability.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.15 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.15 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

684e97d8-dea5-4e75-b2eb-6c2c4f6585dd.verification_plan: Test under varying solar conditions to ensure consistent energy output.

411542ea-182c-4a9d-8e1e-106a3b931327.name: Filtration Subsystem
411542ea-182c-4a9d-8e1e-106a3b931327.description: Removes contaminants from raw water to produce potable water with minimal cost.

embodiment.description: Utilizes a ceramic filter element for basic filtration.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

411542ea-182c-4a9d-8e1e-106a3b931327.verification_plan: Test filtration efficiency under various water quality conditions.

ed2417f9-fcc1-4f88-be58-e0c69eac8a76.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
ed2417f9-fcc1-4f88-be58-e0c69eac8a76.description: Monitors and displays water quality parameters with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.description: Incorporates basic sensors for pH, turbidity, and TDS.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

ed2417f9-fcc1-4f88-be58-e0c69eac8a76.verification_plan: Test sensor accuracy and response time under various conditions.

a18ca5c8-8e3d-4495-bbbc-d24458da0b1e.name: Power Management Subsystem
a18ca5c8-8e3d-4495-bbbc-d24458da0b1e.description: Manages and optimizes power distribution and storage with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.principle: Basic Charge Controller with Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a basic charge controller and battery management system.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

a18ca5c8-8e3d-4495-bbbc-d24458da0b1e.verification_plan: Test battery life and charging efficiency under various loads.
